casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Ardie DeFronso NOLON. No. 59P97-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 6, 2005. Kathleen U. Baldwin, Assistant Attorney General, William David McFadyen, Jr., District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st day of March 2005 by Defendant to Proceed as Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of April 2005."
